summary: Website/app with deployment flow; user now requests a login page to access the site.

existing_features.title: Create a dedicated login screen that allows users to sign in using Internet Identity before accessing the app.

Gate the existing Stock Register UI behind authentication by updating the top-level app rendering to show the Login screen when no identity is present and show the existing StockRegisterPage only after successful authentication.
Add a logout control in the authenticated UI that clears the Internet Identity session and returns the user to the Login screen.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a login page to access/enter the website (authentication entry screen).
Restrict backend write operations to authenticated callers by rejecting anonymous principals for add/update/remove operations.
